statements: UPDATE luxury_real_estate_security SET client_name = 'John Doe', client_phone = '(123) 456-7890' WHERE id = 'cdc01245-96b8-49d5-815c-f158604c3c75';

UPDATE luxury_real_estate_security SET client_name = 'John Doe', client_email = 'johndoe@example.com', client_phone = '+1-123-456-7890', property_address = '123 Main St', financial_data = '{"annual_income": 150000, "credit_score": 750}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
